features.title: WHAT AWAITS YOU ON THE SERVER

farm.title: Personal Farm
farm.description: Unique farm mechanics where you can raise animals and earn passive income

instances.title: Instances
instances.description: Private farming locations with great loot and a raid boss at the end

gear.title: Gear & Cosmetics
gear.description: Hundreds of costumes and accessories, rare gear, and 3 tiers of epic jewelry — all enhancing your experience without affecting class balance

fun.title: Comfortable Gameplay & Endless Fun
fun.description: Stable server, high population, various events, and personal tournaments to keep you entertained

launch.title: Launch the Game
launch.description: *Before launching, check for updates via launcher.exe
